title: Generalization of backpropagation with application to a recurrent gas market model

tldr.text: This paper will derive a generalization of backpropagation to recurrent systems (which input their own output), such as hybrids of perceptron-style networks and Grossberg/Hopfield networks, and does not require the storage of intermediate iterations to deal with continuous recurrence.
